scripts.samples:serve: sh -c 'SAMPLES_PORT=$(grep "^SAMPLES_PORT=" .env 2>/dev/null | cut -d "=" -f2 || echo "8000"); SAMPLES_DIR=$(grep "^SAMPLES_DIR=" .env 2>/dev/null | cut -d "=" -f2 || echo "samples"); serve -l "$SAMPLES_PORT" "$SAMPLES_DIR" --cors'
scripts.samples:generate: sh -c 'SAMPLES_DIR=$(grep "^SAMPLES_DIR=" .env 2>/dev/null | cut -d "=" -f2 || echo "samples"); GITHUB_USERNAME=$(grep "^GITHUB_USERNAME=" .env 2>/dev/null | cut -d "=" -f2); GITHUB_REPO=$(grep "^GITHUB_REPO=" .env 2>/dev/null | cut -d "=" -f2); npx strudel-json-generator -p "$SAMPLES_DIR" -u "$GITHUB_USERNAME" -r "$GITHUB_REPO"'
scripts.samples:generate:local: sh -c 'SAMPLES_DIR=$(grep "^SAMPLES_DIR=" .env 2>/dev/null | cut -d "=" -f2 || echo "samples"); SAMPLES_PORT=$(grep "^SAMPLES_PORT=" .env 2>/dev/null | cut -d "=" -f2 || echo "8000"); npx strudel-json-generator -p "$SAMPLES_DIR" --base-url "http://localhost:$SAMPLES_PORT/"'
scripts.samples:generate:watch: sh -c 'SAMPLES_DIR=$(grep "^SAMPLES_DIR=" .env 2>/dev/null | cut -d "=" -f2 || echo "samples"); SAMPLES_PORT=$(grep "^SAMPLES_PORT=" .env 2>/dev/null | cut -d "=" -f2 || echo "8000"); npx strudel-json-generator -p "$SAMPLES_DIR" --base-url "http://localhost:$SAMPLES_PORT/" --watch'
scripts.setup: npm run setup:submodule && npm run setup:mcp && npm run setup:config && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:mcp: cd mcp-server && npm install && npm run build
